name: protected
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a protected area or animal is affected by laws that prevent it being harmed: This dolphin is a protected species. a network of marine protected areas along the California coast
kept safe from danger or harm, or away from other people: She had a very protected childhood. The house feels very protected and private.
More examplesFewer examplesGreat white sharks are a protected species along the California coast.He opposes drilling in the Arctic Wildlife Refuge, a protected area.protected wilderness/wetlandsAdditional protected habitat for blue iguanas is essential.
